S06n574:1: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat-āścaryaṃ bhagavan mahāguṇasamanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ |
S06n574:6: avinivartanīyena hi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anantamaparyantaṃ jñānaṃ pratilabdhamasaṃhāryaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhaiḥ ||
S06n574:7: subhūtirāha-pratibalo bhagavan avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpānākārān liṅgāni nimittāni nirdeṣṭum |
S06n574:8: ata eva bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya gambhīrāṇi gambhīrāṇi sthānāni prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāni sūcayitavyāni |
S06n574:9: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-sādhu sādhu subhūte yastvaṃ gambhīrāṇi gambhīrāṇi sthānānyārabhya nigamayitukāmaḥ |
S06n574:11: ānimittasya apraṇihitasya anabhisaṃskārasya anutpādasya ajāterabhāvasya virāgasya nirodhasya nirvāṇasya vigamasyaitatsubhūte adhivacanaṃ yaduta gambhīramiti ||
S06n574:12: subhūtirāha-eteṣāmeva bhagavan kevalametaddharmāṇāmadhivacanaṃ na punaḥ sarvadharmāṇām?
S06n574:33: yatra subhūte na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānam,
S06n574:36: subhūtirāha-āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvatsūkṣmeṇopāyena rūpataśca nivārito nirvāṇaṃ ca sucitam |
S06n574:38: yāvatsūkṣmeṇopāyena vijñānataśca nivārito nirvāṇaṃ ca sūcitam |
S06n574:39: bhagavānāha-imāni subhūte gambhīrāṇi gambhīrāṇi sthānāni prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāni yaścintayiṣyanti tulayiṣyati upanidhyāsyati-evaṃ mayā sthātavyaṃ yathā prajñāpāramitāyāmājñaptam |
S06n574:42: tathā saṃpādayamānastathopanidhyāyaṃstathopaparīkṣamāṇastathā prayujyamānastathā ghaṭamānastathā vyāyacchamāna ekadivasamapyatra yogamāpadyate |
S06n574:44: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte kaścideva puruṣo rāgacarito vitarkacaritaḥ |
S06n574:45: tasya puruṣasya rāgacaritasya vitarkacaritasya striyā abhirūpayā prāsādikayā darśanīyayā saha saṃketaḥ kṛto bhavet |
S06n574:46: sā khalu punaḥ strī paraparigṛhītā bhavet |
S06n574:48: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte kiṃpratisaṃyuktāstasya puruṣasya vitarkāḥ pravarteran?
S06n574:49: subhūtirāha-strīpratisaṃyuktā eva bhagavaṃstasya puruṣasya vitarkāḥ pravarteran-iyamāgacchati, iyamāgatā |
S06n574:54: bhagavānāha-tatkiṃ manyase subhūte divasasyātyayena tasya puruṣasya kiyanto vitarkā utpadyeran ?
S06n574:55: subhūtirāha- bahavo bhagavan divasasyātyayena tasya puruṣasya vitarkā utpadyeran |
S06n574:56: bhagavānāha-yāvantaḥ subhūte tasya puruṣasya divasasyātyayena vitarkā utpadyeran,
S06n574:57: iyataḥ subhūte kalpān bodhisattvo mahāsattvaśchorayati vipṛṣṭhīkaroti saṃsārādvyantīkaroti,
S06n574:58: ya iha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yathājñaptaṃ yathākhyātaṃ yathopadiṣṭaṃ yathoddiṣṭaṃ yathānirdiṣṭaṃ tiṣṭhati śikṣate pratipadyate upanidhyāyati yogamāpadyate,
S06n574:61: evaṃ hi subhūte yaśca bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyogamanuyuktaḥ,
S06n574:64: yaśca prajñāpāramitāvirahito bodhisattvo gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpāṃstiṣṭhan dānaṃ dadyāt,
S06n574:65: ayameva tato viśiṣyate yo'yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattva evamekadivasamapi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogamāpadyate ||
S06n574:66: punaraparaṃ subhūte yaśca bodhisattvo mahāsattvo gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpāṃstiṣṭhan srotaāpannebhyo dānaṃ dadyāt,
S06n574:73: yaśca bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yathopadiṣṭaṃ yathoddiṣṭaṃ yathānirdiṣṭaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ tathaiva yogamāpadyeta ekadivasamapi |
S06n574:74: ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvastataḥ paurvakādbodhisattvadbahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati ||
S06n574:75: punaraparaṃ subhūte yo bodhisattvo gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpāṃstiṣṭhan srotaāpanneṣu yāvatsamyaksaṃbuddheṣu dānaṃ dadyāt pratiṣṭhāpayet,
S06n574:78: yaśca bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāvihārī tato manasikārādvyutthāya dharmaṃ deśayet,
S06n574:79: ayameva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvastataḥ paurvakādbodhisattvādbahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati ||
S06n574:80: punaraparaṃ subhūte yo bodhisattvo gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpāṃstiṣṭhan srotaāpanneṣu yāvatsamyaksaṃbuddheṣu dānaṃ dadyāt pratiṣṭhāpayet,
S06n574:84: yaśca bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāvihārī tato manasikāradvyutthāya dharmadānaṃ dadyāt,
S06n574:85: ayameva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsattvastataḥ paurvakādbodhisattvādbahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati ||
S06n574:86: punaraparaṃ subhūte yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpāṃstiṣṭhan srotaāpanneṣu yāvatsamyaksaṃbuddheṣu dānaṃ dadyāt pratiṣṭhāpayet,
S06n574:88: ārabdhavīryaḥ san dhyāneṣu bodhipakṣeṣu ca dharmeṣu yogamāpadyeta,
S06n574:90: yaśca khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvastathā dharmadānaṃ datvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayet,
S06n574:91: ayameva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvastataḥ paurvakādbodhisattvādbahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati ||
S06n574:92: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvastathā dharmadānaṃ datvā prajñāpāramitoktena pariṇāmena anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayet,
S06n574:94: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvastathā dharmadānaṃ datvā prajñāpāramitoktena pariṇāmena anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayet,
S06n574:95: pariṇāmya ca pratisaṃlāne na punareva yogamāpadyeta |
S06n574:96: yaśca khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvastathā dharmadānameva dadyāt,
S06n574:98: sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na tāvatpuṇyaṃ prasavati,
S06n574:99: yāvadya evaṃ dharmadānaṃ dadad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratisaṃlāne ca punareva yogamāpadyamānaḥ prajñāpāramitayā ca parigṛhītastatpratisaṃlānamavirahitaṃ karoti prajñāpāramitayā,
S06n574:100: ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati ||
S06n574:101: subhūtirāha-yadā bhagavan abhisaṃskāro vikalpa ityuktaṃ bhagavatā,
S06n574:103: bhagavānāha-so'pīdānīṃ subhūte puṇyābhisaṃskāro bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ śūnyaka ityevākhyāyate,
S06n574:107: yathā yathā khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ sarvadharmān pratyavekṣate,
S06n574:108: tathā tathā subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'virahito bhavati prajñāpāramitayā |
S06n574:109: yathā yathā ca subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'virahito bhavati prajñāpāramitayā,
S06n574:111: subhūtirāha-aprameyasya ca bhagavan asaṃkhyeyasya ca kiṃ nānākaraṇaṃ vā,
S06n574:114: asaṃkhyeyamiti subhūte yanna śakyaṃ saṃkhyayāpi kṣapayitum ||
S06n574:131: bhagavānāha-tatkiṃ manyase subhūte nanu mayā sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā ityākhyātāḥ?
S06n574:137: tasmāttarhi subhūte eṣāṃ dharmāṇāmarthato viśeṣo vā nānākaraṇaṃ vā nopalabhyate |
S06n574:138: abhilāpā ete subhūte tathāgatenākhyātāḥ abhilapitāḥ-aprameyamiti vā,
S06n574:151: subhūtirāha-āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvadyadiyaṃ tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena sarvadharmāṇāṃ dharmatā deśitā,
S06n574:164: dānapāramitāyā api bhagavan na vṛddhirna parihāṇirbhaviṣyati |
S06n574:169: prajñāpāramitāyā api bhagavan na vṛddhirna parihāṇirbhaviṣyati |
S06n574:170: sacedbhagavan āsāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānāṃ na vṛddhirna parihāṇiḥ,
S06n574:171: kathaṃ bhagavan vivardhamānānāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānāṃ balena bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate?
S06n574:173: na ca bhagavan apratipūrayan pāramitāṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'bhyāsannībhavatyanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ |
S06n574:175: na khalu punaḥ subhūte pāramitārthasya kācidvṛddhirvāsti parihāṇirvā vidyate |
S06n574:176: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayata upāyakuśalasya naivaṃ bhavati-iyaṃ dānapāramitā vivardhate,
S06n574:178: api tu khalu punarasyaivaṃ bhavati-nāmadheyamātrametadyaduta dānapāramiteti |
S06n574:179: sa dānaṃ dadat tān manasikārāṃstāṃścittotpādāṃstāni kuśalamūlāni anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati |
S06n574:181: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayataḥ upāyakuśalasya naivaṃ bhavati-iyaṃ śīlapāramitā vivardhate,
S06n574:183: api tu khalu punarasyaivaṃ bhavati-nāmadheyamātrametadyaduta śīlapāramiteti |
S06n574:184: sa śīlaṃ samādāya vartamānastān manasikārāṃstāṃścittotpādāṃstāni kuśalamūlāni anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati |
S06n574:186: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayataḥ upāyakuśalasya naivaṃ bhavati-iyaṃ kṣāntipāramitā vivardhate,
S06n574:188: api tu khalu punarasyaivaṃ bhavati-nāmadheyamātrametadyaduta kṣāntipāramiteti |
S06n574:189: sa kṣāntyā saṃpādayaṃstān manasikārāṃstāṃścittotpādāṃstāni ca kuśalamūlāni anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati |
S06n574:191: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayata upāyakuśalasya naivaṃ bhavati-iyaṃ vīryapāramitā vivardhate,
S06n574:193: api tu khalu punarasyaivaṃ bhavati-nāmadheyamātrametadyaduta vīryapāramiteti |
S06n574:194: sa vīryamārabhamāṇastān manasikārāṃstāṃścittotpādāṃstāni ca kuśalamūlāni anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati |
S06n574:196: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayataḥ upāyakuśalasya naivaṃ bhavati-iyaṃ dhyānapāramitā vivardhate,
S06n574:198: api tu khalu punarasyaivaṃ bhavati-nāmadheyamātrametadyaduta dhyānapāramiteti |
S06n574:199: sa dhyānāni samāpadyamānastān manasikārāṃstāṃścittotpādāṃstāni ca kuśalamūlāni anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati |
S06n574:201: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayataḥ upāyakuśalasya naivaṃ bhavati-iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā vivardhate,
S06n574:203: api tu khalu punarasyaivaṃ bhavati-nāmadheyamātrametadyaduta prajñāpāramiteti |
S06n574:204: sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayaṃstān manasikārāṃstāṃścittotpādāṃstāni ca kuśalamūlāni anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati |
S06n574:206: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat-kā punareṣā bhagavan anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ?
S06n574:208: na ca subhūte tathatā vivardhate, vā,
S06n574:214: evaṃ khalu subhūte anabhilapyasyārthasya na vṛddhirna parihāṇirbhavati |
S06n574:216: evaṃ sarvadharmāṇāmapi subhūte na vṛddhirna parihāṇirbhavati |
S06n574:217: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva ebhirevaṃrūpairmanasikārairviharan āsannībhavatyanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheriti ||
